text: The 3 hotels they own have been closed for the past few years so not so much anymore, they say they've closed them because there's not enough business to keep them open but personally I think they've done it to harm the local economy because when I was growing up before they took them over it was never a problem
People from all over really, lots of French tourists in the summer. It's very much a tourist destination for older people or families. And yeah as mentioned day trippers from cruise ships in guernsey
I'm from Sark, the constable in question is my mates dad, one of the nicest blokes around and he tells this story so well after a few sherrys
